   19: %%
   20: -module(config_restored_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -compile(export_all).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: %% Function: suite() -> Info
   28: %% Info = [tuple()]
   29: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   30: suite() ->
   31:     [{timetrap,1000}].
   32: 
   33: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   34: %% Function: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   35: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   36: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   37: %% Reason = term()
   38: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   39: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   40:     Config1 = [{init_per_suite,?MODULE} | Config],
   41:     TabPid = spawn(fun() ->
   42: 			   ets:new(?MODULE, [named_table, set, public]),
   43: 			   receive _ -> ok end
   44: 		   end),
   45:     [{tab,TabPid} | Config1].
   46: 
   47: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   48: %% Function: end_per_suite(Config0) -> void() | {save_config,Config1}
   49: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   50: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   51: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   52:     ets:delete(?MODULE),
   53:     exit(?config(tab, Config), kill),
   54:     ok.
   55: 
   56: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   57: %% Function: init_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   58: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   59: %% GroupName = atom()
   60: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   61: %% Reason = term()
   62: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   63: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
   64:     [{init_per_group,GroupName} | Config].
   65: 
   66: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   67: %% Function: end_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   68: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   69: %% GroupName = atom()
   70: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   71: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   72: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   73:     ok.
   74: 
   75: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   76: %% Function: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   77: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   78: %% TestCase = atom()
   79: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   80: %% Reason = term()
   81: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   82: init_per_testcase(TC, Config) ->
   83:     Config1 = [{init_per_testcase,TC} | Config],
   84:     ets:insert(?MODULE, {config,Config}),
   85:     %% ct:pal("Config after init_per_testcase(~w) = ~p", [TC,Config1]),
   86:     Config1.
   87:    
   88: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   89: %% Function: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   90: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   91: %% TestCase = atom()
   92: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   93: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   94: end_per_testcase(TC, Config) ->
   95:     ct:pal("Config in end_per_testcase(~w) = ~p", [TC,Config]),
   96:     [{_,MemConfig}] = ets:lookup(?MODULE, config), 
   97:     diff_config(Config, MemConfig, [tc_status]),
   98:     ?MODULE = proplists:get_value(init_per_suite, Config),
   99:     TC = proplists:get_value(init_per_testcase, Config),
  100:     case ?config(tc_group_properties, Config) of
  101: 	undefined ->
  102: 	    ok;
  103: 	Props ->
  104: 	    GName = proplists:get_value(name, Props),
  105: 	    GName = proplists:get_value(init_per_group, Config)
  106:     end,
  107:     ok.
  108: 
  109: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  110: %% Function: groups() -> [Group]
  111: %% Group = {GroupName,Properties,GroupsAndTestCases}
  112: %% GroupName = atom()
  113: %% Properties = [parallel | sequence | Shuffle | {RepeatType,N}]
  114: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [Group | {group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  115: %% TestCase = atom()
  116: %% Shuffle = shuffle | {shuffle,{integer(),integer(),integer()}}
  117: %% RepeatType = repeat | repeat_until_all_ok | repeat_until_all_fail |
  118: %%              repeat_until_any_ok | repeat_until_any_fail
  119: %% N = integer() | forever
  120: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  121: groups() ->
  122:     [{g1,[],[to_tc, exit_tc]}].
  123: 
  124: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  125: %% Function: all() -> GroupsAndTestCases | {skip,Reason}
  126: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [{group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  127: %% GroupName = atom()
  128: %% TestCase = atom()
  129: %% Reason = term()
  130: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  131: all() ->
  132:     [to_tc, exit_tc,
  133:      {group,g1}].
  134: 
  135: 
  136: to_tc(Config) ->
  137:     %% ct:pal("Config for to_tc = ~p", [Config]),
  138:     [{_,MemConfig}] = ets:lookup(?MODULE, config), 
  139:     diff_config(Config, MemConfig, []),
  140:     ct:sleep(2000).
  141: 
  142: exit_tc(Config) ->
  143:     %% ct:pal("Config for exit_tc = ~p", [Config]),
  144:     [{_,MemConfig}] = ets:lookup(?MODULE, config), 
  145:     diff_config(Config, MemConfig, []),
  146:     ct:fail("Goodbye!").
  147:     
  148:     
  149: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  150: %%% HELP FUNCTIONS
  151: 
  152: diff_config(Cfg1, Cfg2, DiffKeys) ->
  153:     diff_config(Cfg1, Cfg2, DiffKeys, []).
  154: 
  155: diff_config([{K,V} | Cfg1], Cfg2, DiffKeys, RemKeys) ->
  156:     case proplists:get_value(K, Cfg2) of
  157: 	undefined ->
  158: 	    diff_config(Cfg1, Cfg2, proplists:delete(K, DiffKeys), RemKeys);
  159: 	V ->
  160: 	    diff_config(Cfg1, proplists:delete(K, Cfg2), DiffKeys, RemKeys);
  161: 	_Other ->
  162: 	    case proplists:is_defined(K, DiffKeys) of
  163: 		true ->
  164: 		    diff_config(Cfg1, Cfg2, proplists:delete(K, DiffKeys), RemKeys);
  165: 		false ->
  166: 		    diff_config(Cfg1, Cfg2, DiffKeys, [K | RemKeys])
  167: 	    end
  168:     end;
  169: diff_config([], [], [], []) ->
  170:     ct:pal("Diff ok!", []),
  171:     ok;
  172: diff_config([], Cfg2, DiffKeys, RemKeys) ->
  173:     Result = {diff_failed, {cfg2,Cfg2}, {diffkeys,DiffKeys}, {remkeys,RemKeys}},
  174:     ct:pal("Diff failed! Result = ~p", [Result]),
  175:     exit(Result).
  176:
